google_play_reviews.content: If you're a fan of VA-11 Hall-A, this app is Jill's phone which mostly offers the Danger/u/ app(which is strangely active). Some people say the music doesn't work, a problem I haven't experienced. It's outdated to the point that new android versions are told outright it cant use certain functions like notifications, and honestly, it fits well. It'd be nice if everything worked, but you're using a phone owned by a bartender struggling to make rent. It's a charming homage to VA-11, and I love it.
This app is great if you love va11halla like i do (:

Edit: I reinstalled this. Music ain't working :( It just leads to a black screen. Please fix this. I've used this app a long time ago. I know what the game was based from but I only knew it by the title and art style, not the game itself ðŸ˜¬ But still, I like this app. It's very calming. I like that you can interact with people. It's pretty good! I should definitely try the actual game though. I just keep forgetting.
Been gatekeeping this app for years. Best decision of my life. Amazing community. Bomb music. Looks exactly like the app in the game. Very cool!!
I love this app to death but I'd honestly like some more updates to be added.
This is cool
Wonderful app, wonderful community, awesome music, God bless the devs
RIP jukebox
Very cool app, just wish the music player and AE worked UPDATE: The AE is back up, yay! The music player still unfortunately does not work tho

Great app but the music stopped working. Tapping on the music logo brings me either to a black screen or a very compressed and glitched player. Backing out only reveals that none of the other buttons work and I have to restart the app.
5/5! great app... lots of features... love the 8bit 80s/90s aesthetic... the app is a great look at cyberpunk/post dystopian technology themes of Glitch City... Sony Xperia 1 android 10.0.0b

Simply amazing. When I found out that this app existed, I did not waste a single second and downloaded it right away. I love Va-11 Hall-A and having this app further strengthened my love for the game. Kudos.
It's an amazing companion app. With an active board.
Look. Do you want a close community with long history? This place is for you. Everyone's really nice, and spammers get cleaned out regularly. Also, burg is 10/10 no questions asked.

A fun app when you know the game, I like all the features but I got ONE bug (only one so it's great): when I click on the music logo I got a black screen (but the auto music at launch works). I'm on the latest version of Android, could someone or a developer help me ?
Hasnt worked in some time, probably because of the host provider change in december
